pros: Good atmosphere, nice colleague, decent salary
cons: Some problems with coordination and implementation for new system

review_title: Prozessorientiert, geht nicht mit der Zeit, fördert Studenten 0%
pros:
Autonomes Arbeiten
Team ist gut
Flexible Arbeitszeiten
cons:
Prozessorientiert bis zum geht nicht mehr
Dauernde Prozessänderungen, führen zu Fehler und Unsicherheit bei Mitarbeitern
Kompetenzenunklarheit
Abteilungen unterstützen sich kaum, Hilfe wird sogar verweigert
Garten hüten Mentalität!
Katastrophale Koordination zwischen den Standorten
Zentralisierung und Dezentralisierung an den falschen Orten
Sparen an den falschen Orten
Konkurrenzkampf zwischen den Profit Center
Manchmal sehr schlechtes Klima
Mitarbeiter und Studenten werden überhaupt nicht gefördert oder sinnvoll eingesetzt, 0 Human Resource Sharing! 
Überforderte Abteilungen

pros: Excellent Colleagues - competent and pleasant, Great diversity in technologies, interesting variety in services, excellent change management and lunch and learn culture
cons: Politics, excessive hierarchy, lot of silos with too many initiatives and difficult relationship between business and IT which impeded collaboration setting one common vision

pros: Lots of possibilities to work in different areas: mobility, insurance, call center, roadside assistance, HR, real estate, finance, automotive expertise, driving courses, etc.
cons: Lack of business oriented strategy or should I say, the top management doesn't put into practice what they say must be done for the company to be sustainable.

pros: work-life balance, a lot of time for me (more than I needed). Some really nice people.
cons: Poor top management with a lot of incompetent people. No challenge, no action, very boring place to work if you are a pro-active and motivated individual.

pros: One of the most known brand in Switzerland. Lot of money to spend.
cons: Difficult to achieve anything. The office is always in your way. The company's best interest is always the last thing people care about.

review_title: The corporate culture equal to a gladiator's arena
pros: If you're good at internal politics, you can be in senior management extremely quickly!
cons: The corporate culture is very much if not only about internal political fights. No vision, no cooperation.
